September 30, 2022
tidge
This is a deceptively simply Sword object that turns the consolation prize of a bad B/C/F roll into a boosted natural damage. I think either of the retail set's "First Children", War or Death, can make good use of this, especially if they have the benefit of Steal Energy from their starting force. War starts with the very nice Giant Reach, but Death starts by dealing a (temporary, but not always) extra click of unavoidable damage on top of powerful damage.
